Replace.Text: This game mode adds new natural disasters, larger and more impactful versions of existing disasters, and increases the chances of all natural disasters. Apocalypse Mode also adds the Soothsayer unit to the game, and should the climate reach its final level of change, comets pummel the earth and destroy humanity.
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement to all units. Promoting a unit does not end that unit’s turn.

Three tile natural wonder. Provides +5 [ICON_Science] Science to adjacent tiles. Units that enter it are teleported to an ocean far away, but naval units that do so earn the ability 'Mysterious Currents' (+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement).

One tile natural wonder. Provides +4 [ICON_Science] Science, +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Fresh Water. Land combat units that enter it receive the ability 'Water of Life' (+10 HP healing in any territory).

Three tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture to adjacent tiles. Major adjacency bonus to Theater Square and Commercial Hub districts. The city that owns the tile receives +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold on its outgoing international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Hacienda, unique to Gran Colombia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +0.5 [Icon_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Food] Food for every two adjacent Plantations (increased to every Plantation with Replaceable Parts). Plantations and Haciendas receive +1 [ICON_Production] Production for every two adjacent Haciendas (increased to every Hacienda with Rapid Deployment). Can only be built on Plains, Plains Hills, Grassland, and Grassland Hills.

You could have followed the whims of your colleagues, Simón Bolívar, but instead you chose to become the Liberator. Hardships never dissuaded you, so hold fast to your ideals and lead your republic into a new age of prosperity.
Earn a Comandante General when entering a new era.
Earn a Comandante General when the game enters a new era.
A special type of Great Person only available to Simón Bolívar. Each has unique abilities, including a passive effect, and a Retire effect.

Gran Colombian Industrial era unique unit that replaces the Cavalry. Low maintenance cost. +2 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for every adjacent Llanero. Fully heals when in range of a Comandante General that activates its retire ability.

Settling adjacent to Fresh Water and Coast do not provide extra [ICON_HOUSING] Housing, instead each Farm provides an additional +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Luxury adjacent to the City Center.

A district unique to the Maya for scientific endeavors. Replaces the Campus district and cheaper to build.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Science] Science bonus for adjacent Plantations. +1 [ICON_Science] Science bonus for every two adjacent Farm or district tiles.
Adjacency: Major [ICON_Science] Science bonus for each adjacent Plantation. Minor [ICON_Science] Science bonus for adjacent Farm or district tiles
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Plantation {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Farm {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.

Lady Six Sky, great warrior mother of Dos Pilas and Wak Kab’nal, lead your people into a new dynasty. Let your reach grow long so you may conquer your enemies near and far. The Gods will guide you, and you will in turn guide your loyal citizens to victory.

Non capital cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +10% to all yields. Other non capital cities receive -15% to all yields. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to units within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to units within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital (Ix Mutal Ajaw)
+{1_Amount} Combat Strength from the Mutal trait
Mayan unique Ancient Era ranged unit that replaces the Archer. Strong ranged attack. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting a wounded opponent.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting a wounded opponent.

Lahore City-State unique unit with a unique Promotion tree. Purchasable with [ICON_Faith] Faith. [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength is increased when Barracks, Armory, and Military Academy buildings are first constructed.
An Apocalypse-mode-specific support unit. Can use the Cause Disaster action to begin a random disaster in the hexes near the unit. Doing so destroys the Soothsayer if it has no more charges.

FOREST FIRE EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- These start in a random Woods or Rainforest tile.[NEWLINE]- Spreads to adjacent Woods or Rainforest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Tiles on fire will damage units and pillage improvements.
